description:
- Summer Sailor Uniform: Bowa "A light summer outfit resembling a seafarer's uniform. "
 - Kid's Sailor Uniform: Bowa "A light summer outfit for children resembling a seafarer's uniform. "
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it. 
 - Sunset Sunglasses "A pair of sunglasses with colorful tinted lenses. "
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
name: Summer Sailor Uniform Set: Bowa
